attributes.action: Call on LCC to reverse it's decision to cut funding to The CAB
attributes.additional_details:
We are greatly concerned about the impact of cutting the funding to such a valuable service on many local people. There are no other organisations locally that provide the same service. 

Please sign and share this petition to call on Lincolnshire to reverse their decision. 
Thankyou for your support.
attributes.background: We are calling on Lincolnshire County Council to reverse their decision to drastically cut funding to The Citizens Advice Bureau. This service is vital to many disabled, ill and vulnerable people in and around Boston and Skegness in providing Benefit advice and support.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of Lincolnshire County Council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
